message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $180 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I really think this product is worth more than $140. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
